titlestmt.titleproper: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, Printed Material, RG 8
A Guide to the John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, Printed Material, RG 8 FA1802

did.unittitle: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, Printed Material, RG 8

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Record Group 8, Printed Material is divided into four series:

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Record Group 8 contains newsletters, articles, clippings, publications, and posters related to the work of the Knight Foundation. This series includes both internal and external communications created by the Knight Foundation as well as secondary sources that cover philanthropy, grants/grantees, and various programs and initiatives.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Material less than 10 years old is restricted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Knight Foundation has title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Knight Foundation.
